entry.title: Dominic Smith (quad) expected to play Sun. - Dominic Smith | NYM
entry.content: Dominic Smith (quad) is expected to return to Grapefruit League action on Sunday.

entry.title: Evan Longoria scratched with sore heel - Evan Longoria | SF
entry.content: Evan Longoria was scratched from the Giants' Cactus League lineup Friday because of a sore heel.

entry.title: Baez's hamstring 'still bothering him a bit' - Javier Baez | CHC
entry.content: Cubs manager Joe Maddon said Friday that Javier Baez's left hamstring is "still bothering him a bit."

entry.title: Zach Davies (oblique) throws bullpen session - Zach Davies | MLW
entry.content: Zach Davies (oblique) threw a bullpen session without issue Friday.

entry.title: Bedrosian 'seen as current favorite' to close - Cam Bedrosian | LAA
entry.content: Jon Heyman of FanRag Sports reports that Cam Bedrosian "is seen as the current favorite" for the Angels' closer job.

entry.title: Rockies finalizing deal with Carlos Gonzalez - Carlos Gonzalez | COL
entry.content: Jon Heyman of FanRag Sports reports that the Rockies are finalizing a contract with Carlos Gonzalez.

entry.title: Matheny not expecting set closer initially - Luke Gregerson | STL
entry.content: Cardinals manager Mike Matheny on Thursday indicated that he doesn't expect to break camp with a set closer.

entry.title: Angels calling Andrelton Simmons day-to-day - Andrelton Simmons | LAA
entry.content: Andrelton Simmons' MRI confirmed a left shoulder strain.

entry.title: Bellinger delivers first Cactus League homer - Cody Bellinger | LA
entry.content: Cody Bellinger connected on his first home run of the spring Thursday in the Dodgers’ Cactus League loss to the Indians.

entry.title: Royals bring back Moustakas on 1-year deal - Mike Moustakas | KC
entry.content: Jeff Passan of Yahoo Sports reports the Royals have reached a one-year, $6.5 million deal with 3B Mike Moustakas.

entry.title: Merrifield doubles and triples in rout of Sox - Whit Merrifield | KC
entry.content: Whit Merrifield doubled and tripled while driving in two runs in a 12-0 rout of the White Sox on Thursday in the Cactus League.

entry.title: Syndergaard strikes out seven Nats - Noah Syndergaard | NYM
entry.content: Noah Syndergaard pitched 3 1/3 scoreless innings and struck out seven Thursday against the Nationals.
